articles.title: Beginner Home Fitness Mistakes That Sabotage Progress: 7 Costly Errors I Made (So You Don't Have To)
articles.author: Mike Thompson
articles.description: Don't burn out, get injured, or quit early like I did. After 3 failed fitness attempts and one minor injury, here are the 7 mistakes that sabotage home workout progressâ€”and exactly how to fix them.

articles.title: Beginner's No-Gym Workout Plan: 4 Weeks to Get Fit at Home
articles.author: Sarah Martinez
articles.description: Stop drowning in expensive gym memberships you never use. After 6 months of testing home workout routines and spending $0 on equipment, here's the 4-week plan that actually got me fit at home.
